plugin_v1.desc: IINA support for Macast. Because iina is developed based on MPV, this plugin's experience is similar to the built-in MPV renderer.
plugin_v1.title: IINA Renderer

plugin_v1.desc: Live support for Macast,It developed based on MPVRenderer,Can be used to watch live TV.
plugin_v1.title: Live Renderer

plugin_v1.desc: PIFMRDS support for Macast. Only for raspberry pi, visit the plugin repository for more information.

plugin_v1.desc: PotPlayer support for Macast, this is a simple plugin that only supports play and stop.

plugin_v1.desc: Using web browser as DLNA media renderer, This plugin can be used to download media files or get some m3u8 played.
